partnerAsylumBefore3April2000.legend: Did your partner first apply for asylum before 3 April 2000?
partnerAsylumBefore3April2000.required: Select yes if your partner first applied for asylum before 3 April 2000.
partnerAsylumBefore3April2000.change: Change whether your partner first applied for asylum before 3 April 2000

partnerSuccessfulDecision.legend: Has your partner recently had a successful decision on their asylum application?
partnerSuccessfulDecision.required: Select yes if your partner has recently had a decision on their asylum application.
partnerSuccessfulDecision.change: Change whether your partner has recently had a successful decision on their asylum application

partnerSuccessfulDecisionDate.legend: What date did your partner get a successful decision on their application?
partnerSuccessfulDecisionDate.required: Enter the date your partner got a successful decision on your asylum application.
partnerSuccessfulDecisionDate.change: Change the date your partner got a successful decision on their application

partnerSupportedByHomeOffice.legend: Has your partner been supported by the Home Office while waiting for a decision on their application?
partnerSupportedByHomeOffice.required: Select yes if your partner has been supported by the Home Office while waiting for a decision on their application.
partnerSupportedByHomeOffice.change: Change whether your partner has been supported by the Home Office while waiting for a decision on their application
